short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: QA Assistant Tool helps to track test execution in TestRail, shows the list created/closed/reopened defects in JIRA, etc.
short.uk: Цей додаток дозволяє додавати визначений шаблон до опису дефекту в Джирі

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
QA Assistant Tool is a tiny helper for Quality Engineer. 
Features:
- Track test execution in TestRail: Number of executed test cases per test run.
- Track the list of created/closed/reopened defects in JIRA by you and your team.
- Quickly add your own template to Jira Defect (using Context menu)
- Quick comments for JIRA when you are closing a defect (using Context menu)
